title: College Study Time
description: Are college students learning less than they used to? Some recent, high-profile studies suggest the answer is yes. One reason […]
contentencoded:
Are college students learning less than they used to? Some recent, high-profile studies suggest the answer is yes. One reason may be how much – or how little – studying today’s college students do.


Guest: Daniel de Vise, Higher Education Reporter for the Washington Post.


Read Daniel de Vise’s blog, “College Inc.”
